subject: Re: New quote: Careers Page Updates - NDC and DBDental
preview: Hi William, Sure, we have made the below changes. Regarding the header image(s) they resize once the page is loaded (or refreshed). So technically as long as the user isn't resizing their browser the

full_threads.body:
Hi William, 

Sure, we have made the below changes. Regarding the header image(s) they resize once the page is loaded (or refreshed). So technically as long as the user isn't resizing their browser they will be fine. It appears it's a bug with the page builder the site has been built with in combination with the way the site has been coded. We can explore it further, but are hesitant to as it may be a 'rabbits warren' if that makes sense?

@heath All good now on this one. Let me know if this is ok for you? especially the dbdental roles images

https://www.nationaldentalcare.com.au/careers-v2/
https://www.dbdental.com.au/careers-v2/

Hi Heath,

Thank you!

Sorry I gave you the wrong link. Here's the right one: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Sx9rt2IuKmfhT7aMPhwBUvDDt5KWcghX?usp=sharing.

I've also updated DBD's testimonial document as they added another testimonial.

Here's a comment from the client re testimonial on DBD that came in on the weekend: Seeing as we don't have that many for DB Dental, can we also please use the testimonials from the NDC page? Then slowly over time I can change them all to DB testimonials. When someone first clicks on the role though, please make sure the DB Dental testimonial comes up first.

My feedback:

NDC
- The banner is no longer responsive on a big screen (https://cbo.d.pr/N8xJnH)
- Please remove this testimonial (https://cbo.d.pr/WbpTE0) on both websites. Veronica doesn't work for the business anymore.


DBD
- The banner is no longer responsive on a big screen. The client is yet to provide an image of the DBD team
- Gordon's quote should say DB Dental Clinical Advisory Committee - we recently changed the name. https://cbo.d.pr/1PFUC1
- The FAQ update request is misunderstood. We want to keep the FAQ as NDC's but substitute every "National Dental Care" to "DB Dental". I've highlighted the words that needed changing: https://cbo.d.pr/rX8f93.
- Change "NDC" to "DB Dental": https://cbo.d.pr/QSzImH

Thanks!


Kind Regards,










William Yap
Senior Marketing Manager


P: 1300 660 285 · M: 0401 771 320


50 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060

Hi William, 

Confirming we have completed the below, with one exception: 

- The OUR ROLES images should be the DB Dental ones I sent you through the other day - see attached again with DB testimonials page. I'm still awaiting a dentist one. (I've compiled the file here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ihpA_zePE5S-xA8eVITEDCuWCHJCWCtI/view?usp=sharing)

Would you mind resending these images, I can't find them for some reason and the link above just goes to the written testimonials.

Hi Heath,

Client's feedback:

NDC Career Page:
- With the photo on the main banner, is it possible to maintain the responsiveness in the way that people's head is not cut off (particularly on big screen - https://cbo.d.pr/RcsRGV)? Perhaps sacrifice the bottom part of the photo in the responsiveness.
- The practices near me button should go to NDC's homepage and not DBD's.
- We've updated testimonials. Please see document attached, I have attributed two of the testimonials that were missing a name before (one DA and one hygienist) to new people.
- Gordon's quote needs to say National Dental Care / DB Dental. https://cbo.d.pr/Wsu461
- Gordon's quote should say NDC Clinical Advisory Committee - we recently changed the name. https://cbo.d.pr/1PFUC1
- Remove this testimony: https://cbo.d.pr/yc3GF3. The consultant has left the business.


DBD Career Page:
- We'll provide another photo which will show the DBD team. Please also note on the responsiveness as mentioned above.
- Please separate 4 from TEETH. So it appears as 1300 4 TEETH across website wide.
- Under why work with us and the education and training icon, change the copy to say DB Dental (https://cbo.d.pr/wBjotG)
- The OUR ROLES images should be the DB Dental ones I sent you through the other day - see attached again with DB testimonials page. I'm still awaiting a dentist one. (I've compiled the file here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ihpA_zePE5S-xA8eVITEDCuWCHJCWCtI/view?usp=sharing)
- Culture and values copy needs to change to DB Dental (https://cbo.d.pr/jiOry0)
- Gordon's quote needs to say National Dental Care / DB Dental. (https://cbo.d.pr/Wsu461)
- Gordon's quote should say DB Dental Clinical Advisory Committee - we recently changed the name. https://cbo.d.pr/1PFUC1
- The contact us map needs to be the DB Dental head office - DB Dental Group Cnr Tydeman & Pensioner Guard Rds, NORTH FREMANTLE WA 6159
- Under FAQs, please change the copy to say DB Dental.
- Change OUR STORY copy to the below:

Our Story

DB Dental is a successful dental practice group with one goal: to set the benchmark in providing our patients with the best available oral health services on the west coast.

Founded in 1987, DB Dental has grown from one practice to 18, located across regional and metropolitan Perth. Now a part of the National Dental Care group since 2016, central to our continued success is our teams that now currently total more than 1000 staff and Providers.

We attract and retain the best dental practitioners and support teams because we have a strong and collaborative culture which encourages networking, mentoring and development.


Thank you.


Kind Regards,










William Yap
Senior Marketing Manager


P: 1300 660 285 · M: 0401 771 320


50 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060

https://www.nationaldentalcare.com.au/careers-v2/

For Careers link, I'm thinking replacing the content of the old careers page with this brand new design. This way we don't need to re-link the button from the old to new one. Hope that make sense.

Hi Heath,

Here are additional changes from the client:

- Can we please get rid of that yellow bar which says join national dental care over the banner image and move the writing below above the three icons?

- Please change the image of Gordon for his testimonial underneath culture and values. A new image is attached.

- Please update the FIND PRACTICE NEAR ME button to click through to the homepage for NDC, and https://www.dbdental.com.au/map-locations/ for DBD.

- Can we please confirm that any enquiries and register for job alerts emails go to careers@nationaldentalcare.com.au ?

- When the Careers pages are launched, we need to update the CAREERS link on the header and footer of both websites to point to this new page.

- Attached is the latest NDC testimonial. I'm expecting more updates on this but if this is something that we can update ourselves, we can move on with coding.


Kind Regards,










William Yap
Senior Marketing Manager


P: 1300 660 285 · M: 0401 771 320


50 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060

Hi Heath,

Thank you for the update.

I've spoken to the client. I had to get clarification from the client what they wanted to with the testimonials section because she had multiple testimonies per role on the document. So what we clarified was she wanted to have multiple testimonies scrolling in each role, exactly like what you did with PRACTICE STAFF https://cbo.d.pr/J1Dtgu. She also wanted automatic scrolling (9 seconds per testimony).

She still has to update us with testimonies but if we can update (add/remove/edit) the testimonies ourselves, we can go ahead with coding DB Dental. Let me know if this is possible.

Thanks Heath.



Kind Regards,










William Yap
Senior Marketing Manager


P: 1300 660 285 · M: 0401 771 320


50 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060

Hi William, 

We have made the requested changes: https://www.nationaldentalcare.com.au/careers-v2/

Let me know if you like this header better? And the extra Lorem Ipsum FAQ was just some dummy text that was left there. We have now removed it. 

Do you think it's ok for us to code up the DB Dental one now?

@heath all good now on this one.

Hi Heath,

Thanks for the changes.

Here's the client's feedback:
1) The testimonials need to slow down as they're scrolling too quickly. Also they need to have the same format of the name and location of the individual - I have fixed on the word document and attached for you, please use this new version of testimonials as I took some out. Just a note that one DA and 2 x hygienist testimonials are missing names but I'm waiting on those.

2) The yellow block with join national dental care just looks a little weird, can we do something different please? Something less blocky and more refined. No white text on yellow background please.

3) Can we change 850 staff to 1,000 staff?

4) Can we extend the 'our story' section blue background to the width of the page?

5) FAQs, the top one is lorem ipsum - where did that come from?

6) Can we please change the text to Hygienist / OHT - https://cbo.d.pr/xvLdP1


For DB Dental specifically:
1) Please find attached the testimonials for DB Dental (you already have one of Nikki smiling on NDC).

Thank you


Kind Regards,










William Yap
Senior Marketing Manager

Hi William, 

Sure, confirming we have made the below updates. 

Regarding the DNS setup etc. noted, it can be messy as (surprisingly) these details tend to get forgotten when acquisitions of smaller business happens. It's a killer. I'm surprise how often we come across it to be honest. Let me know if I can help in anyway?
@heath All good now on this one. Cheers!

Hey Heath,

Thank you! Please find below my feedback.

Item 2, it was meant to be a body content change, not the title. So please revert the title back to We Are Big and update the content to OVER https://cbo.d.pr/OgIQZd.

Item 3, like item 2 it was a content change. So please revert the title back to We Represent You and update the content to Clinical Advisory Committee https://cbo.d.pr/s1K4Dh

Item 9, Sorry I forgot to mention that the head office is located here: https://goo.gl/maps/ZHEFuwaRfo97QqRa9.

On a different topic, their IT team is still trying to figure out the DNS setup. The previous hosting provider for Apple Dental refused to hand over details so it looks like they had to build something from scratch.


Kind Regards,

@joel great thanks!!

Hi William, 

We have updated the careers page with the most recent round of changes.

1)   Can we move the join NDC and discover a bright future sentence further down so it’s in line with the bottom of the image?
- DONE
2)   Under 1. We’re big, can you please change copy to say OVER 1,000 highly trained dental industry experts?
- DONE
3)   Under 2. We represent you, can you change copy to Clinical Advisory Committee?
- DONE
4)   Can we please move the video under why work with us section, above our roles
- DONE
5)   The dental assistant image needs to be more centred please
- DONE
6)   Can we flip Antony’s photo again as it looks strange that way!
- DONE
7)   With the testimonials, can we just have the ones that relate to the people in the images? So when you hover over their faces it comes up with their testimonial.
- DONE (instead of hovering they need to click it - for mobile purposes) let me know if this is ok?
8)   Can we have a bigger space between culture and values and Gordon’s testimonial? Can we also make his testimonial section a different colour so it stands out a bit more? Maybe use the blue behind the benefit icons?
- DONE (I changed the background to white instead)
9)   Under get in touch, the address is incorrect – it’s showing our Brisbane office.
- DONE (Not sure if this is the right address)
10)  FAQs are lorem ipsum but need the right copy which is already on the site.
